entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gods Lake

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
